動物用藥品名稱: 馬爾他雞新城病、產卵下降症、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病不化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、產卵下降症、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS (STRAIN LA SOTA):10^9 EID50BEFORE INACTIVATION. INACTIVATED EDS`76 VIRUS (STRAIN 127 MCFERRAN): 10^8 EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION. INACTIVATED INFECTIOUS BRONCHI-TIS VIRUS (STRAIN MASSACHUSETTS M41): 10^7.5 EID50 BEFORE INACTIV-ATION. INACTIVATED GUMBORO DISEASE VIRUS (STRAIN WINTERFIELD 2512): 10^6 EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION. SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.037 ML.LIGHT MINERAL OIL 0.337 ML. THIOMERSAL 50UG.
